name: untimely
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
Something bad that is untimely happens unexpectedly early or at a time that is not suitable: It was this passion for fast cars that led to his untimely death at the age of 43. Synonym
ill-timed

Add to word list
(of something bad) happening unexpectedly early or at a time which is not suitable: A love of fast cars led to his untimely death at the age of 34.
